title: Jessica Nigri (Special Guest) - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 224
description:
Thanks to Blue Apron for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://BlueApron.com/Greggy

Jessica Nigri joins us to discuss Disney movies, cosplay, and robbing a bank. (Released first to http://www.Patreon.com/KindaFunny Supporters on 03.16.18)

Hit the links below for more Jessica Nigri:
instagram.com/jessicanigri
twitter.com/ojessicanigri
youtube.com/jessicanigri
patreon.com/JessicaNigri
facebook.com/officialjessicanigri

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
